changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE user ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, username varchar (250) NOT NULL, password varchar (2500), email varchar (2000), name varchar (2000), user_role varchar (20), is_app_user boolean default false, added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now() );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE user AUTO_INCREMENT = 1000000;

changeSet.author: msingla
msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE locality ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar (25) NOT NULL, description varchar (255), added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), city_id bigint, FOREIGN KEY (city_id) REFERENCES city (id) );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE attachment ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar (25) NOT NULL, image_url varchar (255), entity_id bigint, version bigint, added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), attachment_type varchar (20) );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE caterer ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar (25) NOT NULL, description varchar (2550), version bigint, cuisine_offered varchar (5000), added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), city_id bigint, FOREIGN KEY (city_id) REFERENCES city (id), locality_id bigint, FOREIGN KEY (locality_id) REFERENCES locality (id), created_by bigint );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE venue ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar (255) NOT NULL, description varchar (2550), type varchar(20) NOT NULL, version bigint, added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), city_id bigint, FOREIGN KEY (city_id) REFERENCES city (id), locality_id bigint, FOREIGN KEY (locality_id) REFERENCES locality (id), created_by bigint );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE photographer ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar(25) NOT NULL, description varchar (2550), version bigint, added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), city_id bigint, FOREIGN KEY (city_id) REFERENCES city (id), locality_id bigint, FOREIGN KEY (locality_id) REFERENCES locality (id), created_by bigint );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE decorater ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar (25) NOT NULL, description varchar (2550), version bigint, added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), city_id bigint, FOREIGN KEY (city_id) REFERENCES city (id), locality_id bigint, FOREIGN KEY (locality_id) REFERENCES locality (id), created_by bigint );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE entertainment ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar (25) NOT NULL, description varchar (2550), addition_details varchar (3000), version bigint, entertainment_type varchar(20), added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), city_id bigint, FOREIGN KEY (city_id) REFERENCES city (id), locality_id bigint, FOREIGN KEY (locality_id) REFERENCES locality (id), created_by bigint );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE miscellaneous ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar (25) NOT NULL, description varchar (2550), addition_details varchar (3000), version bigint, miscellaneous_type varchar(20), added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), city_id bigint, priority bigint, FOREIGN KEY (city_id) REFERENCES city (id), locality_id bigint, FOREIGN KEY (locality_id) REFERENCES locality (id), created_by bigint );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE room ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, room_type varchar (50) NOT NULL, description varchar (255), room_dimensions varchar (255), added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now() );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE service ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, service_type varchar (20) NOT NULL, service_for_entity varchar(20), tab_data_name varchar (50), filter_data_name varchar (20), is_filter boolean, added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now() );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE amenities ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, amenity_type varchar (500) NOT NULL, description varchar (255), is_indoor_amenity boolean, amenity_dimensions varchar (500), added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), is_filter boolean );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE address ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, address_line_1 varchar (255) NOT NULL, address_line_2 varchar (255), city varchar(25), state varchar(25), pincode bigint, primary_phone varchar (20), secondary_phone varchar (20), email varchar(50), entity_id bigint, version bigint, added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now() );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE venue_rooms ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, venue_id bigint, room_id bigint, min_cost float, ac_availability boolean, fridge_availability boolean, locker_availability boolean, led_availability boolean, attached_bathroom_availability boolean, version bigint, added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES venue (id), FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES room (id) );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE entity_services( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, entity_id bigint, service_id bigint, min_service_cost float, max_service_cost float, version bigint, added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES service (id) );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE venue_amenities( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, venue_id bigint, amenities_id bigint, min_amenity_cost float, max_amenity_cost float, version bigint, added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES venue (id), FOREIGN KEY (amenities_id) REFERENCES amenities (id) );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE venue ADD COLUMN priority bigint;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE caterer ADD COLUMN priority bigint;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE entertainment ADD COLUMN priority bigint;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE photographer ADD COLUMN priority bigint;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE decorater ADD COLUMN priority bigint;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE attachment ADD COLUMN help_text varchar (255);

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE venue_rooms ADD COLUMN hot_water_availability boolean;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE address ADD COLUMN latitude float;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE address ADD COLUMN longitude float;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE filters ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, filter_type varchar (20) NOT NULL, filter_for_entity varchar(20), filter_name varchar (50), added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now() );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE entity_filters( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, entity_id bigint, filter_id bigint, version bigint, added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), FOREIGN KEY (filter_id) REFERENCES filters (id) );

changeSet.author: msingla
msingla
msingla
msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE entity_services ADD COLUMN max_capacity varchar (10);

changeSet.author: msingla
msingla
msingla
msingla
msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE caterer ADD COLUMN is_pure_veg boolean;

changeSet.author: msingla
msingla
msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE amenities ADD COLUMN is_detailed_amenity boolean;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE venue_packages( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, venue_id bigint, welcome_drinks varchar (25), soups varchar (25), salads varchar (25), veg_starters varchar (25), non_veg_starters varchar (25), veg_main_course varchar (25), nonveg_main_course varchar (25), raita varchar (25), dal varchar (25), rice_biryani varchar (25), assorted_breads varchar (25), deserts varchar (25), package_type varchar (50), package_price varchar (10), added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES venue (id) );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE venue_packages AUTO_INCREMENT = 700000;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE service add column is_key_highlight boolean default false;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE service add column is_additional_service boolean default false;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE additional_service ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, service_type varchar (20) NOT NULL, service_for_entity varchar(20), tab_data_name varchar (50), filter_data_name varchar (20), is_filter boolean, added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now() );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE additional_entity_services( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, entity_id bigint, additional_service_id bigint, min_service_cost bigint, max_service_cost bigint, version bigint, added_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), FOREIGN KEY (additional_service_id) REFERENCES additional_service (id) );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE additional_service AUTO_INCREMENT = 800000;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE additional_entity_services AUTO_INCREMENT = 900000;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE additional_entity_services ADD COLUMN max_capacity varchar (10);

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE address MODIFY email VARCHAR(225);

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE amenities ALTER COLUMN is_detailed_amenity SET DEFAULT false;;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE entity_review ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, reviewed_by varchar (250) NOT NULL, review_comment varchar (10000), star_rating float, user_image_url varchar (5000), entity_id bigint, is_deleted boolean default false, reviewed_on timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), review_money varchar(50) );

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE entity_review AUTO_INCREMENT = 4000000;

changeSet.author: msingla
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE user ADD COLUMN is_active boolean default false;
